original: PETTERSSON, Nils Axel, Civilingenjör, Åbo, Finl, f Ståla, Gbgs o Boh l, 17/2 81 av säteriäg C N P o Barnhardine Sandbäck, gm Beatrice Walker. Mog.ex högre latinlärov Gbg 01, ex CTL (E) 04, stud Polytechnikum i Zurich 05—07, ex där. Anst v Husqvarna Vapenfabr AB 04—05, konstr.byrån v Verkstaden Kristinehamn 07—13, Elektr o Mek Prövn.anst 13, tekn ch v AB Åbo Ing.byrå 13—19, vkst dir o styr.ordf där sed. 19, tilllika vkst dir o styr.ordf i AB Sv Gården Verdandi 29—38 samt i OY Björkboda Bruk AB sed. 31. Tf lekt i teoret o tillämp eltekn v Åbo Akademi 22—33. Har bl a proj o utfört elektr kraftverk f Värtsilä Jvks AB, AB Ferraria, Akkas Ångsågs AB mfl ind.företag 1 Finl. Deläg i Svanviks säteri i Bohusl. Led av Sv Tekn.frn mfl. Resor: Tyskl, Schweiz, Ital, Ryssl, USA mfl länd. Hobby: Segling.
translated: PETTERSSON, Nils Axel, Civil Engineer, Åbo, Finland, b. Ståla, Gothenburg and Bohus County, February 17, 1881. Son of estate owner C.N.P and Barnhardine Sandbäck, m. Beatrice Walker. Completed higher studies in Latin at Gothenburg in 1901, completed technical studies at CTL (E) in 1904, studied at the Polytechnic in Zurich from 1905 to 1907. Worked at Husqvarna Vapenfabr AB from 1904 to 1905, at the construction office of Verkstaden Kristinehamn from 1907 to 1913, at the Electrical and Mechanical Testing Institute from 1913. Technical manager at AB Åbo Engineering Office from 1913 to 1919, vice president and chairman since 1919. Also served as vice president and chairman of AB Sv Gården Verdandi from 1929 to 1938, as well as OY Björkboda Bruk AB since 1931. Acting lecturer in theoretical and applied electrical engineering at Åbo Academy from 1922 to 1933. Has, among other things, designed and carried out electrical power plants for Värtsilä Jvks AB, AB Ferraria, Akkas Ångsågs AB, and other industrial companies in Finland. Co-owner of Svanviks estate in Gothenburg and Bohus County. Member of the Swedish Engineering Society and others. Traveled to Germany, Switzerland, Italy, Russia, USA, and other countries. Hobby: sailing.
